inclusion.criterion: Age higher than or equal to 65 aa
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: the capacity to perform geriatric assessment tests
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: sinus rhythm at the time of evaluation (for the evaluation of HRV only)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: altered cognitive abilities such as to impair the evaluation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Inability or unwillingness to sign informed consent
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has Marfan's syndrome and severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation, but remains symptomatic and is prepared for surgery. EF of 65% on TTE.
